means: 基里巴斯（西太平洋上一共和国）

sentence.Network_en: Two uninhabited Kiribati islands, Tebua Tarawa and Abanuea, disappeared underwater in 1999.
sentence.Network_cn: 基里巴斯国的两个无人岛特布·塔拉瓦和阿巴尼亚在1999年被海水淹没,已经消失了.

sentence.Network_en: Formerly the Gilbert Islands, Kiribati achieved independence from the United Kingdom in 1979.
sentence.Network_cn: 基里巴斯原称吉尔伯特群岛, 1979年脱离英国独立.

sentence.Network_en: There is also a place for newcomers East Timor and Kiribati.
sentence.Network_cn: 此外,奥运新成员还有东帝汶和基里巴斯.
